title: Scorched
description: Four sexy dragon shifters. One fiery dragoness.I’m done with the dragon shifter lifestyle. No more Dragon Gatherings. No more fancy dinners. And most certainly no more hanky-panky with dragons at the shifter nightclub.So what if I have wings and sometimes spew fire? It doesn’t mean I can’t find a nice human guy to live happily ever after with.Now the fertility stone has been stolen, and I’ve been enlisted to help with the investigation. Unfortunately, that means I’m stuck at a billionaire’s villa with four smoking hot dragon shifters.Whatever happens, I need to keep them from stealing my heart as well.THIS IS A REVERSE HAREM DRAGON SHIFTER ROMANCE.
author: Misty Malloy
